com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.configuration
Class SimpleConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.markdown.slidery.configuration.SimpleConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, ConfigurationBuilder, ConfigurationReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonConfiguration, XmlConfiguration
public class SimpleConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configuration

Straight-forward in-memory implementation of the Configuration interface.
